name: Mundane (Katanya Bliss, doxaa, Michael Irlandez, Spencer Dam)
name_original: Mundane (Katanya Bliss, doxaa, Michael Irlandez, Spencer Dam)
description:
It's just your average Monday.

This is a game about going through a normal workday. Follow along as you get ready for your job, do some work, kill your coworker, and drive home! This game provides an accurate depiction of what the average workday is like, with absolutely no illegal activities at all. 

Mundane is made up of a series of minigames designed and developed by a group of first-year game design students. 

Please fill out our feedback form! 

Credits

Art Lead - Michael Irlandez

Scrum Master - Spencer Dam

Project Lead - Katanya Bliss

and Brayden Lovasz
